patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Parallel Stance with an X-Back Hand
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to C forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a horizontal strike with twin side fists.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Move the right foot to C to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a pressing block with an X-fist.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Execute a rising block with an X-knife-hand while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 2 and 3 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Execute a high front strike to D with the right knife-hand bringing the left palm on the right elbow joint while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Move the left foot to C to form a sitting stance toward B while executing a horizontal strike to C with the left back hand.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Execute a middle crescent kick to the left palm with the right foot.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Lower the right foot to C, forming a sitting stance toward A while striking the left palm with the right front elbow.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Thrust to B with the left back elbow placing the right side fist on the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward A.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Execute a side back strike to B with the right back fist and extending the left arm to the side-downward while maintaining a sitting stance toward A.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Bring the left foot to the right foot, forming a close stance toward D, at the same time thrusting with a twin side elbow.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Cross the left foot to the right foot, forming a close stance toward D while turning the face to A, Keeping the position of the hands as they were in 10. Perform in a fast motion.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Execute a middle side piercing kick to A with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 11.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Lower the right foot to A, and then cross the left foot over the right foot, forming a right X-stance toward D while executing a horizontal thrust with a twin elbow.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Move the right foot to A to form the sitting stance toward D while executing a right horizontal punch to A.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Execute a high front strike to D with right knife-hand, bringing the left back hand in front of the forehead while standing up toward D.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a twin knife-hand block to B while forming a right L-stance toward B, pivoting with the right foot.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Jump to execute a mid-air kick to B with the right foot while spinning clockwise.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Land to B forming a right walking stance toward B while executing a middle block to B with the right double forearm.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Bring the left foot to the right foot to form a closed ready stance B toward D.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Jump to D forming a right X-stance toward BD while executing a high side strike to B with the right back fist bringing the left finger belly to the right side fist.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Move the left foot to C to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a rising block with the left forearm.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Execute a middle front snap kick to D with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 21.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Lower the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a high punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Move the right foot to D to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle thrust to D with the right straight fingertip.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Move the left foot to D turning counter-clockwise to form a sitting stance toward A while executing a high side strike to D with the left back fist.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Move the right foot to F turning counter-clockwise to form a right walking ready stance toward F.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Jump to execute a flying high kick to F with the right foot.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Land to F to form a right fixed stance toward F while executing a checking block to F with an X-knife hand.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Move the left foot to F forming a right L-stance toward F while executing a pressing block with an X-fist.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Execute a middle side front snap kick to F with the left foot while executing a middle wedging block with the inner forearm. Execute a middle side front snap kick to F with the left foot while executing a middle wedging block with the inner forearm.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Lower the left foot to F forming a left walking stance toward F while executing a high vertical punch to F with a twin fist.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Move the right foot to F to form a right fixed stance toward F while executing a middle outward block with the right knife hand and a middle pushing block with the left palm.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Slide to F forming a right L-stance toward F while executing a middle punch to F with the left fist.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Move the left foot to the side rear of the right foot and the right foot to E to form a right L-stance toward F and then jump to E maintaining a right L-stance towards F while executing a middle guarding block to F with the forearm.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a middle turning kick to DF with the right foot.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Lower the right foot to F and then execute a middle back piercing kick to F with the left foot.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Lower the left foot to F to form a right L-stance toward F while executing a middle guarding block to F with the forearm.
patternSteps.39: Step 38. Move the left foot to E forming a left l-stance toward F while executing an upward block to F with the right palm.
patternSteps.40: Step 39. Move the right foot to E forming a right walking stance to E while executing a circular block to ED with the left inner forearm.
patternSteps.41: Step 40. Execute a circular block to DE with the right inner forearm while forming a right walking stance toward DF.
patternSteps.42: Step 41. Move the left foot on line EF to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the left fist.
patternSteps.43: Step 42. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
patternSteps.44: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
